makeTable: CREATE TABLE `links` ( `link` char(64) NOT NULL, `data` varchar(55000) NOT NULL, `parameters` varchar(512) NOT NULL, `clicks` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `expiration` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `server` varchar(5120) NOT NULL) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
optimizeTable: ALTER TABLE `links` ADD PRIMARY KEY (`link`), ADD KEY `clicks` (`clicks`), ADD KEY `expiration` (`expiration`);
